scripts.build-and-push:markets-observer: npm run docker:build:markets-observer && npm run docker:push:markets-observer
scripts.build-and-push:candles-processor: npm run docker:build:candles-processor && npm run docker:push:candles-processor
scripts.build-and-push:positions-processor: npm run docker:build:positions-processor && npm run docker:push:positions-processor
scripts.build-and-push:signals-processor: npm run docker:build:signals-processor && npm run docker:push:signals-processor
scripts.build-and-push:account-observer: npm run docker:build:account-observer && npm run docker:push:account-observer
scripts.build-and-push:trader: npm run docker:build:trader && npm run docker:push:trader
scripts.build-and-push:all: npm run build-and-push:markets-observer && npm run build-and-push:candles-processor && npm run build-and-push:positions-processor && npm run build-and-push:signals-processor && npm run build-and-push:account-observer && npm run build-and-push:trader
